mapper.select: SELECT /* selectAgentStateList */ COLGOVER.RASMBLY_ID rasmblyId , COLGOVER.RASMBLY_NM rasmblyNm , COLGOVER.SYSTEM_STTUS_CODE systemSttusCode , COLGOVER.RASMBLY_STTUS_CODE rasmblySttusCode , SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(COLGOVER.LAST_CNTC_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),1,4) || '-' || SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(COLGOVER.LAST_CNTC_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),5,2) || '-' || SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(COLGOVER.LAST_CNTC_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),7,2) lastUpdtDt , COLGOVER.DELETE_DT deleteDt , COLGOVER.ISVIEW isview , SUBSTR(COLGOVER.RASMBLY_ID, 4,3) gubun FROM COLGOVER, COLGOVER_SET WHERE COLGOVER_SET.RASMBLY_ID(+) = COLGOVER.RASMBLY_ID AND COLGOVER.ISVIEW = 'Y' ORDER BY ORDR ASC

SELECT /* selectAgentServerTableList */ COLGOVER.RASMBLY_ID , COLGOVER.RASMBLY_NM , COLGOVER.SERVER_IP , COLGOVER_SET.INSTALL_YEAR , COLGOVER_SET.SERVER , COLGOVER_SET.OS , COLGOVER_SET.WAS , COLGOVER_SET.CPU , COLGOVER_SET.RAM , COLGOVER_SET.MODULE_INSTALL_PATH , DECODE (COLGOVER.SYSTEM_STTUS_CODE,'000','정상',null,'설치안됨','비정상') AS SYSTEM_STTUS_CODE , COLGOVER.LAST_UPDT_DT , COLGOVER_SET.NOTE FROM COLGOVER, COLGOVER_SET WHERE COLGOVER_SET.RASMBLY_ID(+) = COLGOVER.RASMBLY_ID AND COLGOVER.ISVIEW = 'Y' ORDER BY ORDR ASC
SELECT RASMBLY_ID , CMMND_EXC_DT as updateDate FROM COUNCIL_SYSTEM_CONTROL WHERE RASMBLY_ID = #{rasmblyId} AND CMMND_CODE = 'REQ003' -- 업데이트 일자 AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT /*selectAgentInfoOne*/ CST.RASMBLY_ID rasmblyId , CST.RASMBLY_NM rasmblyNm -- 의회명 , CST.SYSTEM_STTUS_CODE systemSttusCode -- 상태코드 , CST.NOTE note , CR.LAST_CNTC_DT lastCntcDt FROM COLGOVER_SET CST, COLGOVER CR WHERE CST.RASMBLY_ID = CR.RASMBLY_ID AND CST.RASMBLY_ID = #{rasmblyId} AND ROWNUM = 1;
